blogs.body:
Why do we use it?
It us a long established fact that a reader will be distracted Importance of The Environment The environment is very important to all living organisms including human beings. The importance of the environment can best be discussed under the importance of Lithosphere, hydrosphere, atmosphere and biosphere for these, lithosphere will be the focus. The structure e of the earth is grouped into two Zones. These are the outer structure and the internal | structure. This is shown in the figure bellow.

blogs.title: Opening party!
blogs.body:
Why do we use it?
It us a long established fact that a reader will be distracted The environment is defined as the surroundings or conditions where a person, animal, or plant lives or strives. In n other words, the environment includes all the factors, external and internal, living and non-living factors which affect an organism (both plants and animals). The structure e of the earth is grouped into two Zones. These are the outer structure and the internal | structure. This is shown in the figure bellow.
